name: Maya R.
reason: Company replaced first-draft content with LLM workflows.
story: My team of eight became two in under one quarter. We now review AI drafts that used to be original campaigns. I shared this story to help others transition faster.

name: Lukas H.
reason: Leadership consolidated QA into AI-assisted developer testing.
story: Automation increased, but defect triage quality dropped. Despite that, they reduced QA headcount by more than half. I am still searching for a stable role.

name: Camille D.
reason: Agency switched to machine translation post-editing with extreme rate cuts.
story: Rates dropped below sustainability in just months. I moved into localization QA and now mentor others on transition planning.

name: Irene M.
reason: Marketing team switched to generative image stacks for all rapid campaigns.
story: I lost my role after seven years. I now work in motion design where human direction still matters most.

name: Антон П.
reason: Первая линия поддержки была заменена AI-чатботом.
story: Нас сократили почти целой сменой за два месяца. Клиенты жалуются на качество бота, но команду обратно не вернули.

name: Anonymous
reason: Company shifted to an AI-first productivity model and froze junior hiring.
story: I changed track into platform operations. Please share your retraining path in the forum so newcomers can follow realistic steps.

name: Test User
story: I lost my role after the company deployed AI dashboards and reduced analyst headcount. I am now sharing this so others can prepare in advance.
